pkgmetadata.longdescription: Fast and Easy Eurostat Data Import and Search // Interface to Eurostats API (SDMX 2.1) with fast data.table-based import of data, labels, and metadata. On top of the core functionality, data search and data description/comparison functions are also provided. Use https://github.com/alekrutkowski/eurodata_codegen a point-and-click app for rapid and easy generation of richly- commented R code to import a Eurostat dataset or its subset (based on the eurodata::importData() function).
